explains: n. 编剧家；电影剧本作家

sentences.en: He's a talented screenwriter who has sold out to TV soap operas.
sentences.cn: 他是个有才华的电影编剧，却改行写起电视肥皂剧来了。

sentences.en: Murphy married British screenwriter Simon Monjack in 2007.
sentences.cn: 墨菲于2007年与英国编剧西蒙·曼杰克结婚。

sentences.en: Now he works as a successful screenwriter, using touch-typing.
sentences.cn: 现在，他是成为用触键打字且成功的编剧。
